last_episode_to_air.name: Beyond Reasonable Doubt
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bronagh tracks down some of the witnesses, who testified against Omar, and makes some extraordinary discoveries.

name: Unsolved: The Man With No Alibi
original_name: Unsolved: The Man With No Alibi
overview: Unsolved: The Man With No Alibi. In the early hours of 12 July 2002 Jong Ok Shin, a 26 year old Korean student, was brutally stabbed to death, as she walked home, after a night out in Bournemouth. Omar Benguit, a heroin addict, was convicted of the murder and sentenced to life in prison.

seasons.name: Season
seasons.overview: Unsolved: The Man With No Alibi. In the early hours of 12 July 2002 Jong Ok Shin, a 26 year old Korean student, was brutally stabbed to death, as she walked home, after a night out in Bournemouth. Omar Benguit, a heroin addict, was convicted of the murder and sentenced to life in prison.
